nodes.text: Guerrerite was a type of orange trade crystal which could be used to upgrade trade equipment. A young smuggler acquired a sample of guerrerite while in the Gnuda ancestral estate on the planet Mataou during the Galactic Empire's Iron Blockade of the Anoat sector.

Guerrerite was first mentioned in the Star Wars Legends article Aliens in the Empire, which appeared on StarWars.com as a Hyperspace exclusive written by Abel G. Peña and Rich Handley in 2007. The substance was confirmed to be canon when it appeared in the video game Star Wars: Uprising as an upgrade material in 2015.
